title: Wind Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Wind Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 166
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْــــــأَلُكَ خَيْرَهَا، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهَا)).
items.transliteration: Allahumma innee as-aluka khayraha wa-aAAoothu bika min sharriha.
items.translation: O Allah, I ask You for it’s goodness and I take refuge with You from it’s evil.

items.title: Dua 167
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَهَا، وَخَيْرَ مَا فِيهَا، وَخَيْرَ مَا أُرْسِلَتْ بِهِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهَا، وَشَرِّ مَا فِيهَا، وَشَرِّ مَا أُرْسِلَتْ بِهِ)).
items.transliteration: Allahumma innee as-aluka khayraha wakhayra ma feeha, wakhayra ma orsilat bih, wa-aAAoothu bika min sharriha, washarri ma feeha washarri ma orsilat bih.
items.translation: O Allah, I ask You for it’s goodness, the good within it, and the good it was sent with, and I take refuge with You from it’s evil, the evil within it, and from the evil it was sent with.
